/users.GET -> /:email: returns a single user by email
/users.GET -> /:email/jobs: returns all jobs for the specified user

POST -> /:email/jobs.creates new job in database and links us: POST: {job_no: '', email: '', job_name: '', pm_first_name: '', pm_last_name: '', pm_email: '', pm_number: ''}

/jobs.GET -> /:job_no: returns a single job by job number
/jobs.GET -> /:job_no/sites: returns all sites for the specified job

/sites.GET -> /:site_id: returns a single site by id
/sites.GET -> /:site_id/risk_assessments: returns all risk assessment ids for the specified site

POST -> /:site_id/risk_assessments.creates new risk asssessment in database: POST: {email: '', response: [{question_id: 1, answers_options: '', mitigation_Measures: '', risk_level: '', multi_option: ''}, {question_id: 2, ...}, }

/sites.GET -> /:site_id/:site_specific_id: returns the specified filled risk assessment

/api./maps/:site_id: returns a single map by siteid
